attributes.action: Make pornography thatreplicates torture illegal to produce/posses or distribute
attributes.additional_details: The government should make it a criminal offence to Produce, Posses or view such images of torture and abuse of any persons for any reason
attributes.background: Within UK borders, vulnerable young people are being forced to endure torture under the guise of pornography- these images and videos are later used to blackmail these young people, how can anyone consent to such things

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about pornography which includes elements of torture. However the production or possession of such pornography could already be an offence under the Obscene Publications Act: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1964/74. It is therefore not clear what you would like the Government to do.

You could start a petition calling on publications featuring torture to be explicitly defined as "obscene" in the Obscene Publications Act, if that is something you'd like to happen.
